titles.title: A bill to provide limits on the reduction of Internal Revenue Service user fees.
A bill to provide limits on the reduction of Internal Revenue Service user fees.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This bill establishes a limit of $1,900 in 2023-2025 on Internal Revenue Service (IRS) user fees (e.g., fees for IRS ruling and other types of letters) for individual taxpayers whose gross income does not exceed $5 million.
